0.text: Innate: Periodically, Illaoi spawns a Tentacle on the nearest terrain perpendicular to her location, if no other Tentacles are already nearby it. Tentacles fully spawn after a 2 second delay and are  untargetable in the meantime.

1.text: Tentacles deal 10 − 180 (based on level) (+ 120% AD) (+ 40% AP) physical damage to all enemies struck when commanded to attack by her abilities. Each Tentacle also  heals Illaoi for 5% of her missing health if it hits at least one enemy  champion. See Pet Details for more details.
Active: Illaoi slams down a Tentacle in the target direction, dealing physical damage.

0.text: Active: Illaoi's next basic attack within 6 seconds gains  225 bonus range and causes her to  leap to the target's location if they're beyond her normal basic attack range.

1.text: The attack deals bonus physical damage, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all Tentacles in range to attack the target. The minimum bonus damage can also be applied against  turrets.

origin: 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5% (+ 2% per 100 ad) of target's maximum health

2.text: Harsh Lesson  resets Illaoi's basic attack timer.

3.text: Harsh Lesson can be activated during Illaoi's other abilities, other than while  pulling a Spirit.

0.text: Active: Illaoi reaches forward with a tendril that stops at the first enemy hit, pulling their Spirit out in front of Illaoi over 0.75 seconds if they're a  champion. The target is  tethered to the Spirit for 7 seconds,  revealing them in addition to granting  sight of the area around them while the tether remains.

1.text: The Spirit spawns with the target's  current health,  armor and  magic resist, and redirects a portion of the pre-mitigation damage received to the tethered champion.

2.text: When the Spirit is killed or the target leaves tether range, the tether is severed, marking the target as a Vessel for 10 seconds and  slowing them by 80% for 1.5 seconds once the tether returns back to them. Each Tentacle autonomously attacks the closest Vessel or Spirit, prioritizing the latter, once every 5.5 / 4.5 / 3.5 (based on level) seconds.

3.text: Enemies made a Vessel also spawn a Tentacle near themselves every 5 / 4 / 3 (based on level) seconds. Tentacles can spawn exceptionally closer to each other than when spawned by Illaoi.

4.text:
Illaoi is  unable to act while firing the projectile and while the target's Spirit is being pulled.
Illaoi cannot re-cast the ability while the Spirit is alive.

Vessels can dispel the  debuff by  taking down Illaoi.

0.text: Active: Illaoi gains  displacement immunity and leaps into the air for the cast time. She then slams her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a Tentacle is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).

1.text: For the duration,  Harsh Lesson's  cooldown is halved, all Tentacles awakened by Illaoi are  untargetable, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack.

origin: 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5% (+ 2% per 100 ad) of target's maximum health
2.concerningText: The attack deals bonus physical damage, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all Tentacles in range to attack the target. The minimum bonus damage can also be applied against  turrets.

3.concerningText: The Spirit spawns with the target's  current health,  armor and  magic resist, and redirects a portion of the pre-mitigation damage received to the tethered champion.

4.concerningText: Active: Illaoi gains  displacement immunity and leaps into the air for the cast time. She then slams her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a Tentacle is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).

origin: 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5% (+ 2% per 100 ad) of target's maximum health
0.concerningText: The attack deals bonus physical damage, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all Tentacles in range to attack the target. The minimum bonus damage can also be applied against  turrets.
The Spirit spawns with the target's  current health,  armor and  magic resist, and redirects a portion of the pre-mitigation damage received to the tethered champion.

Active: Illaoi gains  displacement immunity and leaps into the air for the cast time. She then slams her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a Tentacle is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

stats.originHTML:

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% / 9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for ( 7.8% / 3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% / 60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% armor penetration, and 5% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% /  9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion,  heal for ( 7.8% /  3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% /  60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 35% / 15%) of all post-mitigation physical damage received, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: Champion takedowns remove Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heal you for 15% of your maximum health over 2 seconds.
